abstract: Flooding caused by monsoon rains in Indian state Gujarat kills at least 41 people and destroys thousands of homes.
lead_paragraph: At least 41 people have been killed in severe flooding caused by heavy monsoon rains that have lashed part of the western state of Gujarat.

headline.print_headline: Asia; India: Severe Flooding Kills Dozens

snippet: At least 41 people have been killed in severe flooding caused by heavy monsoon rains that have lashed part of the western state of Gujarat.
